sentences.sContent: Why we like him: For They Don't Make This Anymore, a visually cacophonous installation at Baltic in Gateshead inspired by the world of surveillance.
sentences.sContent_eng: Why we like him: For They Don't Make This Anymore, a visually cacophonous installation at Baltic in Gateshead inspired by the world of surveillance.
sentences.sCn: 为什么我们喜欢他 ：因为他们不再这样做，受监视世界的启发，在盖茨黒德波罗的海展示的看上去杂乱的装置。

trans.tranCn: a波罗的海的, 波罗的语的
trans.tranOther: a branch of the Indo-European family of languages consisting of Lithuanian, Latvian, and Old Prussian
